fullplot: A peaceful, frightened little man (Dinos Iliopoulos) is mistakenly identified as "the dragon" ("o drèkos"), a notorious criminal at large. He briefly and reluctantly rules the underworld until they realize their mistake.

title: The Ogre of Athens
